short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that adds an extra header bar on top of native navigation bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will give you extra header bar on top of native AWS navigation bar.
You can distinguish the separate account easily by icon, color and message. This will prevent you from operating at wrong account.
